title: Tandoori Chicken
description: Fear Risotto no more! This simple recipe is perfect for family dinners.
ingredients: 1 cup buttermilk (or 1 cup milk with 1 tbsp white vinegar or lemon juice)
Cooking oil or butter for greasing the pan

title: Paneer Tikka
description: Take your boring salads up a knotch. This recipe is perfect for lunch and only contains 5 ingredients!
ingredients: Chopped coriander leaves and lemon wedges for garnish
steps: In a bowl, mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, tikka masala, lemon juice, oil, and salt to create a marinade.
Add the paneer cubes to the marinade and coat them well. Let it marinate for 30 minutes.
Thread the marinated paneer onto wooden skewers.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat and grease the grates.
Grill the paneer skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally until they are charred and cooked through.
Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and lemon wedges before serving.

title: Honey Chicken
description: Take your boring salads up a knotch. This recipe is perfect for lunch and only contains 5 ingredients!
ingredients: Sesame seeds and chopped green onions for garnish
steps: In a bowl, mix honey, soy sauce, olive oil, minced garlic, minced ginger, salt, and pepper to create a marinade.
Add the diced chicken to the marinade and let it marinate for 20-30 minutes.
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add the marinated chicken. Cook until browned and cooked through.
Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions before serving.

title: Vadai
description: Take your boring salads up a knotch. This recipe is perfect for lunch and only contains 5 ingredients!
ingredients: 1 cup urad dal (black gram dal), soaked for 3-4 hours
A handful of curry leaves, chopped
steps: Drain and grind the soaked urad dal into a smooth batter. Add a little water if needed.
In a bowl, mix the ground urad dal batter, chopped green chilies, chopped onion, chopped curry leaves, cumin seeds, and salt.
Heat oil in a pan for deep frying.
Take a small portion of the batter and flatten it to form a vada shape.
Fry the vadas in hot oil until they turn golden brown and crispy.
Remove and drain excess oil on paper towels. Serve hot.

title: Gulab Jamun
description: Take your boring salads up a knotch. This recipe is perfect for lunch and only contains 5 ingredients!
steps: Mix milk powder, flour, ghee, milk, and baking soda into a smooth dough.
Roll into small balls and fry.
Make sugar syrup, add cardamom, saffron, and rose flavoring.
Soak fried balls in syrup and serve.

title: Banana Pancake
description: Fear Risotto no more! This simple recipe is perfect for family dinners.
steps: Whisk dry ingredients in a bowl.
Combine egg, buttermilk, mashed bananas, melted butter, and vanilla.
Mix wet ingredients into dry ingredients.
Heat griddle, pour batter, cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

title: Choco Overload Brownie
description: Baked Cod with Vegetables. 30 minute meal!
steps: Melt the butter in a saucepan.
Stir in sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt.
Add the chocolate mixture to dry ingredients.
Spread batter in a greased 9x13 inch baking pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, then cool and cut into squares.

title: Chicken Kurma
description: Take your boring salads up a knotch. This recipe is perfect for lunch and only contains 5 ingredients!
steps: Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
Add eggs, buttermilk, oil, and vanilla; beat until smooth.
Stir in boiling water until combined.
Pour batter into pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes, then remove and cool on racks.

description: Take your boring salads up a knotch. This recipe is perfect for lunch and only contains 5 ingredients!

title: Prawn Gravy
description: Take your boring salads up a knotch. This recipe is perfect for lunch and only contains 5 ingredients!
steps: Whisk egg yolks and sugar in a heatproof bowl.
Heat the mixture until thickened, then let it cool.
Whip heavy cream to stiff peaks and fold into mascarpone mixture.
Combine cooled egg mixture with mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and arrange in a dish.
Repeat layers, refrigerate, and dust with cocoa powder before serving.
